sentences: Ta oli pimedaks jäänud haiguse tagajärjel.
Toho(o) pime, see on ju lausa uskumatu lugu!
context: The Estonian word 'pime' is a versatile adjective with multiple meanings related to darkness and lack of light/sight. It can describe physical darkness (night, unlit rooms), blindness or visual impairment, mental ignorance or dullness, emotional states like uncontrollable anger, metaphorical darkness in situations, and even as an interjection expressing surprise or emphasis.
